meanings.definition: To become yellow or more yellow in color.
meanings.sent1: The leaves were yellowing in the autumn sun.
meanings.sent2: The banana was yellowing on the kitchen counter.
meanings.sent3: The old photo was yellowing like a fading memory.
meanings.sent4: The once vibrant painting was now yellowing with age.
meanings.sent5: The white shirt was slowly yellowing from repeated washes.

meanings.sent1: The yellowing of the leaves signaled the arrival of fall.
meanings.sent2: The yellowing of the paper was due to exposure to sunlight.
meanings.sent3: The yellowing of the book pages made them look like ancient scrolls.
meanings.sent4: The gradual yellowing of the sky at sunset was breathtaking.
meanings.sent5: The yellowing of the teeth made her self-conscious about her smile.

meanings.definition: The act of causing something to become yellow.
meanings.sent1: The yellowing of the fabric was a result of improper storage.
meanings.sent2: The yellowing of the walls was caused by years of cigarette smoke.
meanings.sent3: The yellowing of the sauce was a culinary disaster.
meanings.sent4: The yellowing of the photo was due to exposure to acidic conditions.
meanings.sent5: The yellowing of the flowers was accelerated by the hot weather.
